div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1766 Nimrud on the Tigris, c. 40 km. below Ninive, Adiabene, 1957 Burial: late 3rd cent. B.C. Contents: 6 AR Lysimachus: 2 lifetime tetradr. ( Magnesia 1, unc. 1) 2 post. tetradr. ( Byzantium 1, Tenedos 1) Attalus I: 1 tetradr. Seleucus III: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Disposition: unknown Jenkins, Iraq 1958, pp. 158-62, illus.
